abstracts.cdata!:
This loan restructuring for the St.
            Kitts and Nevis HIV/AIDS prevention and control project
            would: restate the development objective of the project and
            revise the monitoring and evaluation framework; ii) simplify
            the project design by realigning project components; iii)
            update costs of project activities; introduce changes to the
            institutional arrangements to clarify roles and
            responsibilities of the implementing agencies involved in
            project execution and strengthen capacity for project
            implementation; and, extend the project closing date by one
            year to allow adequate time for completion of project
            activities. These changes will require amendments to the
            loan agreement.
